Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS_INS_SP" ( P_GROUP_ROLE_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_USER_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO V_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS ( ID, GROUP_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) SELECT V_ID, G.ID, U.ID, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY FROM CMN_SEC_GROUPS G, CMN_SEC_USERS U WHERE G.GROUP_CODE = P_GROUP_ROLE_CODE AND U.USER_NAME = P_USER_NAME AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'USER/GROUP ASSIGNMENT ALREADY EXISTS' FROM CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS UG, CMN_SEC_GROUPS G1, CMN_SEC_USERS U1 WHERE UG.GROUP_ID = G.ID AND UG.USER_ID = U.ID AND G.GROUP_CODE = P_GROUP_ROLE_CODE AND U.USER_NAME = P_USER_NAME); END;
